title: need help
content:
anyone know the name of this font? its really similar to handel gothic but the M is off... any ideas?

[http://localhostr.com/files/309ac6/Untitled-1.tif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821043440/http:/localhostr.com/files/309ac6/Untitled-1.tif "http://localhostr.com/files/309ac6/Untitled-1.tif")
author: Lukasz

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821043440im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bauhaus_4810.JPG)
  
Looks like Bauhaus, but with the lowercase **m** modified to cap size, and the horizontal stroke on the **L** extended.

actually looked at that one too, but unfortunately it's not it either unless they modified it quite a bit, L is extended, and like you said M is lower to make upper, but G is a bit off too horizontally and not as geometric as Bauhaus.
